text:
@SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe Hey Nancy, the entire world wasn’t prepared for this coronavirus crisis!!!
I’m perplexed why Nancy, the Dems & the media are not blaming China for this shitshow crisis??? https://t.co/GXYYCGRPUZ
